column4: After bootup this morning my Ubuntu 7.04 Laptop does not accept my password! BIOS and Grub are not encrypted. The Debian Reference (section 8.1.1) hints at "I've forgotten the root password." How to proceed?
access to the hardisk and clear the root pass
do you change the pass root?
I cannot do what you advise as I have no access to my Ubuntu.
so you mean you forgot the user pas?
I do not mean that I forgot my password. I entered it correctly several times. I restarted the computer. I entered my password again. In vain.
that's weird if you entered the right password
so is it true nonTLS version is bad?
I do not know the word 'nonTLS version'
My Ubuntu version is 7.04. This is a non-Long Time version.
